thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could not have been better!
thread.title_full: Could not have been better! - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Елена К
title: Could not have been better!
text: We were very happy having made the right choice to stay in this hotel. It was great from all perspectives: comfort, location, charm, friendliness, breakfast... It is a charming little place, very close to 2 metro stops, and thus within a short ride to all main attractions. The neighborhood is safe, still pretty touristy, but with a variety of good restaurants where you would also see many locals. Rooms are very cute and clean. They are on rather small side, but provide a lot of storage space, so you don't have to trip over your luggage. Design is very pretty and provides for a charming holiday atmosphere, seems to be freshly done. Bathroom had a large shower and modern design. Staff was great and spoke very well english. Breakfast had moderate choice, but food was very fresh and coffee tasted good ;). We could not have made a better choice really!
